name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 本課程介紹作業研究中非線性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、等候原理、存貨模式、專案管理、模擬等。
schedule:
Week 1. Basic Modeling in LP
Week 3. Network Optimization Models
Week 4. Project Management PERT/CPM
Week 5~6. Deterministic/Stochasic Dynamic Programming
Week 8~9. Integer Programming
Week 10~11. Game Theory
Week 12. Decision Analysis
Week 14~15. Markov Chain
Week 16. Application of Queueing Theory and Simulation
